sentences.english: Participants 130 cases with epithelial tumors of lacrimal gland.
sentences.chinese: 研究對象130例原發淚腺上皮性腫瘤。

sentences.english: Objective To remedy lacrimal hypersecretion by procaine blocking lacrimal gland .
sentences.chinese: 目的利用普羅卡因封閉淚腺治療淚液分泌過多症。

sentences.english: Bichons are sometimes found to have very small tear ducts or to have tear ducts that are blocked.
sentences.chinese: 比雄擁有很少的淚腺或有時候淚腺容易被堵塞。

sentences.english: Excuse me ah there is artificial lachrymal gland ah?
sentences.chinese: 請問啊有人工淚腺的啊？

definition: to burst into tears/to sob loudly/to bawl

faulty wording/mispronunciation due to a speech defect
